app.name: Snes9x RX
app.long_description:
Featuring: - MSU-1 audio enhancement chip support. - Classic Controllers support (NES / SNES). - Mayflash 2-port SNES USB adapter. - Experimental DualShock 3 (wired) support. - Wii U Pro Controller support. - Wii U Gamepad controller support through VC injects. - Retrode 2 USB adapter support. - Broadcast Satellaview-X support (BIOS optional). - Turbo Mode/Fast-Forward button feature. - Screenshot / Cover / Artwork display. Cycle between them with the +/Z button!
- Video filters: Sharp / Soft / HQ2X / Scale2x / Scanlines - Audio filters: Gaussian / Linear / Cubic / Sinc - SNES CPU overclock. (Low/Medium/Max) - Super FX overclock (20/40/60/80/100/120 MHz). - Wiiflow plugin mode.
